ssa-survivor-benefits-spouse-disabled.ti: Survivors Benefits for Spouse with Disabilities
ssa-survivor-benefits-spouse-disabled.he: Survivors Benefits for Spouse with Disabilities
ssa-survivor-benefits-spouse-disabled.su: Social Security survivors benefits are paid to a surviving spouse of eligible workers and under certain circumstances to a surviving divorced spouse of eligible workers.
ssa-survivor-benefits-spouse-disabled.el: You are at least 50 years old.
